means: 无法满足的，贪得无厌的

sentence.Network_en: The public has an insatiable appetite for stories about the famous.
sentence.Network_cn: 公众对名人有着难以满足的好奇心。

sentence.Network_en: The man was lascivious, sexually perverted and insatiable.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个人是一个欲壑难填的变态色情狂。
他们是贪得无厌的征税员。

英语专业八级核心词汇_普特英语听力 ... inordinate adj 紊乱的 insatiable adj 不知足的贪求无厌的 insidious adj 阴险的.

list.abs: He was dominated by an insatiable drive for fame ., 他被一种难以满足的成名驱力支配著.
成语翻译_英语杂谈... ... 弹冠相庆 congratulate each other 得寸进尺 be insatiable 提纲挈领 concentrate on the main points.
insatiable是什么意思... ... Insatiable Consumer ： 贪得无厌消费者 be insatiable ： 得陇望蜀 The Insatiable ： 永不满足.
in bed , you two have nearly insatiable appetites , which is good , for you will enjoy one another hilt .在床上，两个人有差不多贪婪的胃口，这是好的，因为你们将充分喜爱彼此。
fed the god of war insatiable ., 满足神对战争的渴望.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French insaciable or Latin insatiabilis, from in- 'not' + satiare 'fill, satisfy' (see satiate)

entry.tran: 无法满足的;贪得无厌的
entry.def: If someone has an insatiable desire for something, they want as much of it as they can possibly get.

example.ex: The public has an insatiable appetite for stories about the famous...
example.tran: 公众对名人有着难以满足的好奇心。
他们是贪得无厌的征税员。
